languages.text: {n}Фигура в красном, похожая на призрака, осторожно приближается к вам. С аскетичного лица смотрят огромные, полные печали глаза.{/n} "Сомнение отвергнуто. Доминат предубеждения завершен". {n}В голосе Авеля слышится та же нездешняя глубина, что наполнила вокс Паскаля.{/n}

{n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фигура в красном, похожая на призрака, осторожно приближается к вам. С аскетичного лица смотрят огромные, полные печали глаза.{/n} "Сомнение отвергнуто. Доминат предубеждения завершен". {n}В голосе Авеля слышится та же нездешняя глубина, что наполнила вокс Паскаля.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}幽霊を思わせる赤い人影が、慎重にあなたへ近づいてくる。大きな悲しみをたたえた瞳がこらえるようにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「疑惑は退けた。偏見の支配は終わったのだ」{n}アベルの声は、パスカルのヴォクスを満たしているものと同じく異次元の深さを響かせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}幽霊を思わせる赤い人影が、慎重にあなたへ近づいてくる。大きな悲しみをたたえた瞳がこらえるようにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「疑惑は退けた。偏見の支配は終わったのだ」{n}アベルの声は、パスカルのヴォクスを満たしているものと同じく異次元の深さを響かせる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}那个穿着红色长袍，宛如幽灵般的身影小心翼翼地靠近你。在他那苦行僧般的脸上，一双极尽悲伤的眼睛正望着你。{/n}“怀疑已经消逝，偏见的统治已经结束。”{n}亚伯的声音与帕斯卡一样，充满了超凡脱俗的深奥。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个穿着红色长袍，宛如幽灵般的身影小心翼翼地靠近你。在他那苦行僧般的脸上，一双极尽悲伤的眼睛正望着你。{/n}“怀疑已经消逝，偏见的统治已经结束。”{n}亚伯的声音与帕斯卡一样，充满了超凡脱俗的深奥。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La silhouette fantomatique rouge s'approche de vous avec circonspection, ses yeux énormes rivés sur vous.{/n} « Le doute a été rejeté. La domination du préjudice a pris fin. » {n}La voix d'Abel résonne de la même profondeur surnaturelle que le vox de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette fantomatique rouge s'approche de vous avec circonspection, ses yeux énormes rivés sur vous.{/n} « Le doute a été rejeté. La domination du préjudice a pris fin. » {n}La voix d'Abel résonne de la même profondeur surnaturelle que le vox de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La figura fantasmal de rojo se te acerca con cautela. Su cara asceta te mira con unos ojos enormes y tristes.{/n} «La duda se ha rechazado, el dominio del prejuicio ha terminado». {n}La voz de Abel resuena con la misma intensidad sobrenatural del voco de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La figura fantasmal de rojo se te acerca con cautela. Su cara asceta te mira con unos ojos enormes y tristes.{/n} «La duda se ha rechazado, el dominio del prejuicio ha terminado». {n}La voz de Abel resuena con la misma intensidad sobrenatural del voco de Pasqal.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die geisterähnliche Gestalt in Rot nähert sich dir vorsichtig. Riesige, traurige Augen blicken dich aus seinem asketischen Gesicht an.{/n} "Der Zweifel wurde abgelegt. Die Dominanz des Vorurteils ist beendet." {n}In Abels Stimme liegt die selbe andersweltliche Tiefe, die auch in Pasqals Vox zu hören ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die geisterähnliche Gestalt in Rot nähert sich dir vorsichtig. Riesige, traurige Augen blicken dich aus seinem asketischen Gesicht an.{/n} "Der Zweifel wurde abgelegt. Die Dominanz des Vorurteils ist beendet." {n}In Abels Stimme liegt die selbe andersweltliche Tiefe, die auch in Pasqals Vox zu hören ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kırmızılar içindeki hayaletimsi suret sana dikkatle yaklaşıyor. Çileci suratındaki iri ve hüzünlü gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Şüpheden kaçınıldı. Ön yargının hükmü sona erdi." {n}Abel'in sesi, Pasqal'ın voksundan çıkan ses gibi uhrevi bir derinliğe sahip.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ghostlike figure in red approaches you cautiously. Enormous sad eyes look at you from his ascetic face.{/n} "Doubt has been shunned. The dominate of prejudice has ended." {n}Abel's voice resonates with the same otherworldly profundity that has filled Pasqal's vox.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kırmızılar içindeki hayaletimsi suret sana dikkatle yaklaşıyor. Çilekeş yüzündeki iri ve hüzünlü gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Şüpheden kaçınıldı. Ön yargının hükmü sona erdi." {n}Abel'in sesi, Pasqal'ın voksundan gelen dünya dışı derinlikle uyum içinde çıkıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
